about: I'm studying Databases and knowledge bases in Varaždin, Croatia. Always learning new things and doing amazing stuff with things I already know. I love all kinds of design, but I also love making something amazing out of my designs.

skills.name: Web dev
description: I know my way around HTML, CSS and JavaScript (ES6). Svelte is my favorite JS framework, but I find Blazor (C#) also pretty interesting. Besides that, I know some vanilla PHP and NodeJS, but nothing too complex.
Wordpress is my favorite tool for making good websites that are easy to manage. I can set up the website, customize it to client's liking, manage plugins, do some basic SEO optimization.

skills.name: Design and creative
description: Print, logo and UI/UX design are things i love doing. I use the Adobe suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, Xd) and Figma.
I can also do some basic video and audio editing in Adobe Audition and Adobe After Effects.

skills.name: Mobile and hybrid app dev
description: Flutter is my favorite cross-platform framework, I've done a couple of projects with it and I'm getting better every day. I also explored Electron for a bit and can make a basic app using it.
I know basics of native Android (Kotlin) and native iOS (Swift) development that I learned at the faculty.

skills.name: Dev misc.
description: I've worked mostly with Microsoft technologies and I can develop UWP, WPF and WinForms apps using C# and XAML. I know some C++ and Python.
I'm comfortable with version control using Git and I've done some basic CI/CD setups.
I worked in a couple of teams using Agile and SCRUM methodologies.

skills.name: Languages
description: I'm a native speaker of Croatian and pretty good with English (~level C1).

skills.name: Other
description: I'm pretty good with LaTeX and Microsoft Office and can do some basic computer networking.
